name: CONNECT
description:
Connect is a puzzle game based on a board of hexagons.
In Connect there are three types of tiles: Sources, Pipes and Rotators.
Sources are tiles which output a signal of a certain color in certain direction.
Pipes are used in order to relay signals to nearby tiles. Tiles come in many different variations.
Rotators are the rarest of the three. Rotators rotate all the tiles around them, regardless of their type.

You can rotate Sources and Pipes by clicking on them.
And by clicking on Rotators you will apply their effect.
